Posts.Content: I just wanted to let everyone know I am doing a 2 day breast cancer walk this summer... I am so excited!!  Its called the 2 Day Avon Breast Cancer Walk!!  It's going to be a challange though because I have never walked this much before in my life and I have never raised as much money before either (I have to raise at least $1800)!!  If you want to watch my progress go to this site
Posts.Title: 2 Day Avon Breast Cancer Walk

Posts.Content: Just wanted to update you guys on my fundraising... I am now up to $900 thanks to a $300 donation from someone I dont even know!!! That means I'm half-way there!! I'm very excited because I didn't think I could raise even half that much and now I'm half-way to $1800!!
Posts.Title: 2 Day Avon Breast Cancer Walk

Posts.Content:
Thanks!! I really hope I do get enough to do it! Its for a great cause and I'm very excited... I have already raised over $500 which is more money than I have ever raised for anything before!! Thanks again!
Kimberley
Posts.Title: 2 Day Avon Breast Cancer Walk
